name: Pandemic Responder (BETA)
description:
You take a role as a medical volunteer who was assigned to visit a city that has 0 cases of virus infection, your task is to sterilize the air from the virus with your special disinfectant spraying kit that includes substances that can sterilize the condition of the air. Although, despite the fact it's able to sterilize the air, it couldn't just make people that was infected just instantly cured or become immune with it. You have to keep eliminating the virus while distributing the supplies that are mandatory to keep everyone healthy and safe from possible infections.

You're also equipped with a mask that could scan the existence of those viruses, but it's still a cutting-edge technology, so it could only scan them every several seconds. You can't stand still for too long because the virus gonna get you.

Your primary task is to distribute the supplies
